title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate embeddings, pull/push models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs & embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for any Ollama model; runs entirely in-browser.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI with conversation history, prompt templates, and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s sidebar chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama server on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal reference implementation of retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama + Chroma.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI/CD pipelines for reproducible LLM steps.

title: ollama4j
summary: Community Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive wrappers.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant pane powered by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve deployment recipe for horizontally scaling Ollama inference workers across GPUs.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that brings local LLM completions to block editing via Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat template that swaps between any local Ollama model with conversation memory.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client with context cancellation, streaming, and automatic retry/back-off.
